title: ADC/TOP LF duo partner or a team (currently gold 1)
body: Been kinda inactive for a few months but getting back into the game, currently focusing on ADC so I a support duo would be good, although I am not to fussed, I can also comfortably play Top and a little bit of JG. Not to concerned about rank, I'm only Gold 1, just wanna play with people again as most my mates have quit. Usually play weekdays around 4-9 and more flexible hours on the weekends.
